category.name: AppKey
category.description: a technical key, combination of appId and releaseId

category.name: ArtifactId
category.description: for UI5 based applications, name of the UI5 Component, e.g. "ui.s2p.mm.supconf.monitors1".

category.name: fiori intent
category.description: A combination of "#" <SemanticObject> - <Semanticaction> which appears in the URL of the Fiori Launchpad when addressing the application

category.name: ApplicationComponent
category.description: Support component for the Frontend application, typically

category.name: RoleName
category.description: A business role name, e.g. "Purchaser", for a technical role (PFCG), try BusinessRoleName

category.name: ApplicationType
category.description: Whether the application is classical or not

category.name: BSPName
category.description: Name of the Business Server Page

category.name: BSPApplicationURL
category.description: url of the BSP application in an ABAP system, see BSP name for the technical storage  sab bc

category.name: BusinessCatalog
category.description: The SAP BUsiness catalog which references the application in a "TechnicalCatalog" or "BackendCatalog" (for GUI/WDA transactions

category.name: TechnicalCatalog
category.description: Technical catalog, basic definition of "TargetMapping" and "Tile" for fiori (UI5) Applications

category.name: PrimaryODataServiceName
category.description: OData service : Technical name of the OData Service operating on a Gateway server (and implemented in the R/3 Backend) serving data for UI5 based Fiori Apps

category.name: TransactionCodes
category.description: For GUI based transaction, the transaciton code behind intent, a classical R/3 SAPGUi transaction
